divs: Sighting DetailsAfter going out on my deck, I observed 4 lights in ne sky ratating frantically and projecting the outward and then returning to a center. There were a few clouds but co It kept repeating this pattern for over 2 hours. My husband witnessed as he is not a believer in ufo's, but now is.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Fredericksburg
There were 2 other sightings in Fredericksburg on or around September 8th 2012
Summary: 4 lights rotating, then coming to center, then expanding again and more rotating.
